tweet.text: RT @ClementsCenter: Congratulations to Steve Randolph (Historian @StateDept) on his retirement! Dr. Randolph was the General Editor of #FRU…
tweet.html: RT @ClementsCenter: Congratulations to Steve Randolph (Historian @StateDept) on his retirement! Dr. Randolph was the General Editor of #FRUS & served as Historian from 2011-2017! We had the pleasure of hosting Dr. Randolph last fall for "Rise and Fall of Detente" Conference (w/ @HistoryAtState) pic.twitter.com/Ur3McWpHix
